text: Peddlin' in Society () is a 1946 Italian romance-drama film directed by Gennaro Righelli. == Cast == *Anna Magnani: Gioconda Perfetti *Vittorio De Sica: il conte Ghirani *Virgilio Riento: Don Nicola *Laura Gore: Anna *Zora Piazza: Lucia Perfetti *John Garson: Lucky Brandy *Lauro Gazzolo: Commendator Bardacò *Giuseppe Porelli: Bonifazio *Vittorio Mottini: Nino *Galeazzo Benti: Rorò di Torretia *Vito Annichiarico: Little Tranquillo *Domenico Gambino: Tranquillo's Uncle *Checco Durante: Greengrocer *Anita Durante: Caterina *Dina Romano: Marquise of Mendoza *Enrico Glori: Commissioner *Edda Soligo: Zefira *Maria Grazia Francia ==References== ==External links== * Category:1946 films Category:1946 romantic drama films Category:Italian romantic drama films Category:Films directed by Gennaro Righelli Category:Italian films Category:Italian black-and-white films Category:1946 drama films
title: Peddlin' in Society
